summary: We have 2 papers accepted by IEEE VIS 2025, 5 papers accepted by UIST 2025 and 1 paper accepted by TVCG.
Congratulations to Renzhong Li on winning the Best Paper Award at IEEE VIS 2025 for the paper Causality-based Visual Analytics of Sentiment Contagion in Social Media Topics!

Our paper T3Set: A Multimodal Dataset with Targeted Suggestions for LLM-based Virtual Coach in Table Tennis Training has been accepted by ACM KDD 2025. We have released the dataset and related code. (Dataset Link)
Our paper TableCanoniser: Interactive Grammar-Powered Transformation of Messy, Non-Relational Tables to Canonical Tables has been accepted by ACM CHI 2025 (Honorable Mention Award)
We have 5 papers accepted by ACM CHI 2025 and 1 paper accepted by TVCG
Our paper AdversaFlow: Visual Red Teaming for Large Language Models with Multi-Level Adversarial Flow has been accepted by IEEE VIS 2024 (Honorable Mention Award)
We have 5 papers accepted by IEEE VIS 2024. These papers will also appear in IEEE TVCG.
We have 2 papers accepted by IEEE PacificVis 2024. These two papers will also appear in IEEE TVCG. We have 3 papers accepted by ACM CHI 2024 and 1 paper accepted by IEEE VR.
We have 3 papers accepted by IEEE VIS 2023. These papers will also appear in IEEE TVCG.
Our paper OBTracker: Visual Analytics of Off-ball Movements in Basketball has been accepted by IEEE VIS 2022 (TVCG Track, Honorable Mention Award)

Our papers VisImages: A Fine-Grained Expert-Annotated Visualization Dataset and Visualizing the Scripts of Data Wrangling with SOMNUS have been accepted by TVCG 2022! Each paper is with an open-source project!
